annexes

Class TopicKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • annexes.TopicKeeper

  • public class TopicKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class TopicKeeper represent the storage of all the messages of a Broker (a concurrent hashmap with topic as key and vector of message as value)
    Author:
    Group LAMA

    • Field Summary

      Fields
